nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 8 is the eighth issue of Star Wars Adventures. Its main story, "Endangered, Part 2," was written by Sholly Fisch with art by Jamal Peppers, and its secondary story, "Tales from Wild Space: Gonk!," was written and illustrated by Otis Frampton. The comic was published by IDW Publishing on March 28, 2018.
The crew of The Ghost are trapped on an Imperial ship with no way out! The space pirate Hondo may be their only chance of escape… but can they trust him not to sell them out?
